org.elasticsearch.index.percolator

Class ExtractQueryTermsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.percolator.ExtractQueryTermsService

  • public final class ExtractQueryTermsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to extract query terms from queries and create queries from documents.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ExtractQueryTermsService.UnsupportedQueryException
      Exception indicating that none or some query terms couldn't extracted from a percolator query.

      Creates a boolean query with a should clause for each term on all fields of the specified index reader.

    • Method Detail

      • extractQueryTerms

        public static void extractQueryTerms(org.apache.lucene.search.Query query,
                                     ParseContext.Document document,
                                     java.lang.String queryTermsFieldField,
                                     java.lang.String unknownQueryField,
                                     org.apache.lucene.document.FieldType fieldType)
        Extracts all terms from the specified query and adds it to the specified document.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to extract terms from
        document - The document to add the extracted terms to
        queryTermsFieldField - The field in the document holding the extracted terms
        unknownQueryField - The field used to mark a document that not all query terms could be extracted. For example the query contained an unsupported query (e.g. WildcardQuery).
        fieldType - The field type for the query metadata field

      • createQueryTermsQuery

        public static org.apache.lucene.search.Query createQueryTermsQuery(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader indexReader,
                                                                   java.lang.String queryMetadataField,
                                                                   java.lang.String unknownQueryField)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a boolean query with a should clause for each term on all fields of the specified index reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
